items.content_text: [Edward Waters University, a Florida HBCU, abruptly abolished its faculty union on religious liberty grounds, arguing that collective bargaining violated its "Christian tenets."]( https://jaxtrib.org/2022/11/28/edward-waters-university-shuts-down-faculty-union-claiming-religious-exemption )
A bird has shit on me.

items.content_html:
RT @MicroSFF:

She peeked over the edge of the bed. “Are you still there?” she whispered. The monsters under the bed did not reply. “There is an elf on my shelf.” Silence. “It watches me, and reports to Santa.” A hoarse growl came under the bed: “Turn the light off.” She smiled. “Thank you.”
items.content_text:
[RT @MicroSFF]( https://twitter.com/MicroSFF/status/1604197908667998209 ):
> She peeked over the edge of the bed.
> "Are you still there?" she whispered.
> The monsters under the bed did not reply.
> "There is an elf on my shelf."
> Silence.
> "It watches me, and reports to Santa."
> A hoarse growl came under the bed:
> "Turn the light off."
> She smiled.
> "Thank you."

items.content_html: : it‚Äôs disappointing seeing Twitter users delete their history. It‚Äôs just as good to opt-out of providing content for Elmo to monetize by marking your account private. Deletion means that others can no longer reference favorited/bookmarked materials.

items.content_html:
‚Ä¶seriously considering deleting the Music app from my iPhone. It consistently plays music that I have never heard before randomly when I have not opened or interacted with it at all in days.

I know why, and have filed two radars about it. Apple ‚Äúfixed‚Äù one and ignored the other.

items.content_html:
RT @AlexBlechman:

Programming is chaotic magic. There are no rules. You ask a game dev ‚ÄúCan the player summon a giant demon that bursts from the ground in an explosion of lava?‚Äù and they‚Äôll say ‚Äúsure, that‚Äôs easy‚Äù and then you‚Äôll ask ‚Äúcan the player wear a scarf?‚Äù and they‚Äôll go ‚Äúoof‚Äù

items.content_html: I don‚Äôt want to host my own backend. And I definitely don‚Äôt want to host my own front end! Why does every service have to have an angle?! Why can‚Äôt someone make a simple status/microblog that does what it says, says what it does, and doesn‚Äôt try to be clever?
items.content_text: I don‚Äôt want to host my own backend. And I definitely don‚Äôt want to host my own front end! Why does every service have to have an *angle*?! Why can‚Äôt someone make a simple status/microblog that does what it says, says what it does, and doesn‚Äôt try to be clever?

items.content_html:
I desperately need a Tweetbot for ActivityPub.

No, not for mastodon. I don‚Äôt use mastodon, and mastodon does not implement ActivityPub Client, only (mostly) ActivityPub Server. I‚Äôll write my own ActivityPub-supporting microblog before I install a mastodon instance.
items.content_text:
I desperately need a Tweetbot for ActivityPub.

No, not for mastodon. I don‚Äôt use mastodon, and mastodon does *not* implement ActivityPub Client, only (mostly) ActivityPub Server. I‚Äôll write my own ActivityPub-supporting microblog before I install a mastodon instance.
